subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: After Julien Leparoux rides the contender Union Rags in the Kentucky Derby on May 5, he will move his base to Belmont Park.
snippet: After Julien Leparoux rides the contender Union Rags in the Kentucky Derby on May 5, he will move his base to Belmont Park.
